data.title: Gordon Ramsay, wife expecting fifth child
data.meta_description: Chef and TV personality Gordon Ramsay and his wife and Tana have announced they are expecting their fifth...
data.text:
Gordon Ramsay and his wife Tana, who have been married 22 years, are expecting their fifth child.

Chef and TV personality Gordon Ramsay and his wife and Tana have announced they are expecting their fifth child.

Create a free account to read this article

$ 0/

(min cost $ 0 )

or signup to continue reading

The couple revealed the news in a video on Instagram in which each of their children says "Happy New Year".

After Tana offers her own greeting, the camera pans down to reveal she has a large baby bump.

The 52-year-old celebrity chef can be heard off-camera saying: "And guess what? Happy new year because...."

He captioned the post: "Exciting news ! Happy new year from all the Ramsay's."

Tana, 44, also shared the video, writing: "Happy New Year! Oh, and a little news..." followed by the prayer emoji.

The couple are already parents to Megan, 21, Matilda, 17, and twins Jack and Holly, 19.

In June 2016, they suffered a miscarriage when Tana was five months pregnant.

The news comes just a day after Jack and Holly celebrated their birthday and weeks after the couple had their 22nd wedding anniversary.

On December 21 the chef shared a photo from their wedding, writing: "22yrs today ... happy anniversary gorgeous (at)tanaramsay."

Australian Associated Press
